abstract.p: Correction of June 19 review of television series The League of Gentlemen, which misstated time of its American premiere; June 21 correction of same error in June 18 article rendered last word of show's title incorrectly

block.p: A television review on Monday about ''The League of Gentlemen,'' a comedy series, misstated the time of its American premiere. The premiere was on Aug. 14, 1999, on BBC America, a channel available in New York City through satellite service and on some cable systems nationwide, not Monday night on the cable channel Comedy Central.

A correction in some copies in this space yesterday about the same error in the Television section on Sunday rendered the last word of the show's title incorrectly. It is ''The League of Gentlemen,'' not ''Gentleman.''
